imdb.plot outline: "Yeni Bir Hayat" is a reality television show which started in Turkey in 2012. The show centers on overweight contestants attempting to lose the most weight to fight for a cash prize. There are different variations of "Yeni Bir Hayat"y has made its own adaptation to the show; however, the contestants always have the same goal: to lose the highest percentage of weight (or most weight) to become the Biggest Loser.
imdb.title: Yeni Bir Hayat
plot: "_Yeni Bir Hayat_ (qv)" is a reality television show which started in Turkey in 2012. The show centers on overweight contestants attempting to lose the most weight to fight for a cash prize. There are different variations of "_Yeni Bir Hayat_ (qv)"y has made its own adaptation to the show; however, the contestants always have the same goal: to lose the highest percentage of weight (or most weight) to become the Biggest Loser.::GiFT Productions
